name: Roller Coaster Simulator 3D Adventure
description:
In Roller Coaster Simulator 3D Adventure you will experience a very crazy high speed ride with awesome graphics, realistic game play, high quality controls, great sound effects, multiple camera views, and lots of other stuff.
There are multiple exciting levels, as you move on difficulty will increase. While riding your roller coaster you can adjust the speed of the cart, at the end of the game its up to you to stop the high speed coaster gently otherwise it will crash. You can also select your roller coaster from multiple rides. So, hook up and enjoy your time with crazy high speed city roller coaster.
